57954.「むこうの世界で\n しっぽ巻いて 逃げやがってから\n ずいぶん ご無沙汰だっ:
It's been quite some time since you've run
away with your tail between your
legs, hasn't it?

57955.「フフ 追いつめたですって？: Oh, you really think you've cornered me?

57956.「おあいにくさま。\n あなたは 誘い込まれただけ<heart> \n キャハハ:
Sorry to break it to you, honey...
But I lured you here. <heart>
Ahh ha ha ha ha!

57958.「心臓のない 身体で \n どれだけ戦えるか 試してあげる<heart>\n た:
I wonder how long a body without a heart
can fight? Have a taste of true helplessness!

57960.「クソッ……腐りかけのトマトか。\n こんがり焼きゃ 食えんだろ。:
Damn it... these tomatoes are rotten. Can't
eat 'em unless they're roasted nice.

57962.<center>あなたの心臓は\n壊れてしまって 永遠に失われるの。: Your heart is broken, lost forever...

57963.「カラッポのくせに うずきやがる。\n さすがに 心臓のねえ身体は きついぜ。:
Even though it's gone, I can still feel the
pain... it's tough having a body with no
heart.

57964.「……<cs_pchero>！\n いい時に 来てくれんじゃねえか。:
...<cs_pchero>! You sure came at a
good time.

57965.「すまねえが 魔女のトマトどもを\n けちらしてくれ！:
Sorry, but I need your help clearing out these
rotten tomatoes!

57970.「魔女を追いつめたつもりが 罠にかけられてよ。 \n 悪夢のトマトパーティーだっ:
I thought I had that witch cornered, but she
played me. Talk about a nightmare tomato
party.

57971.「ありがとよ <cs_pchero>。\n お前には いつも 助けられちまうな。:
Thanks, <cs_pchero>.
As always, you're a big help.

57972.「そうだ あの クチうるさい娘……\n アイリは 元気にやってんのか？<yesn:
Oh, yeah, that loudmouth Aili...
Is she doing okay?<yesno><close>

57973.「……そうか。まあ\n あの嬢ちゃんなら 大丈夫だろ。: I see.... Well, I'm sure she'll be just fine.

57974.「俺は こっちの世界に帰ってから\n メルサンディ村を 拠点にして\n 魔女を探:
I've been looking for a witch from Melsandy
Village ever since I returned to this world.

57977.「お前も 知っているように\n 俺の心臓は 魔女によって壊された。:
As you already know, a witch destroyed my
heart.

57978.「この身体には 心臓がねえ。\n そこを 無理に動かしてるもんだから\n ガタが:
This body doesn't have a heart. I'm forcing
it to move by myself, and it's getting more
and more worn out.

57979.「だがな……俺のチカラの源は 村人たちの希望。\n あいつらが 信じてくれる限り:
But... the real source of my strength is the
hope of the villagers. As long as they believe
in me, I won't die. No need to worry.

57980.「これ以上 あの魔女の 好きにはさせねえ。 \n まだ 気配が残ってるうちに追う:
I'm not gonna let that witch have her way any
longer. I'm going after her while there's
still time. See ya later.

57981.「天才童話作家 パンパニーニじゃ！！: Pampanini, the genius fairy tale writer!

57982.「メルサンディ村に残る 名作\n 『小さな英雄ザンクローネの物語』を描いた\n:
He's the one who wrote the classic "The
Story of Little Hero Zankrone," which remains
in Melsandy Village to this day! Woo hoo!

57983.「<pc>。おぬし この村が \n 本当の メルサンディ村でないことは\n とっ:
You must've already known that this village
is not the real Melsandy Village, right?

57984.「お察しの通り この村は 大魔王によって \n わしの描いた童話の世界が 再現さ:
As you may have guessed, this Melsandy Village
exists as a product of the Great Demon King's
creation of my fairy tale's world.

57985.「フン！ わしが描いてる途中で 死んだせいで \n ザンクローネの敗北で終わって:
Hmph! You must have liked the tragic ending
that ended with Zankrone's defeat, since I
died before I could finish it!

57986.「そんな わしが この世界にいる理由じゃが \n ……じつは 自分の分身を 作品:
As for why I'M here... it's my personal style
to secretly insert my alter ego into my works.

57987.「そのせいで どうやら この村が作られた時に \n わしの魂も呼びもどされ この:
It seems that when this village was created,
my soul somehow found its way here and joined
with my alter ego.

57988.「しかし……いまひとつ 解せん。\n なぜ ザンクローネの死で 終わっていたはず:
But...I still don't understand. The story
should've ended with Zankrone's defeat... Why
did it start over again?

57989.「おぬし ひょっとして\n 小さな英雄の物語の続きを 誰かが\n 描いているのを:
Perhaps you know someone who is working on
finishing the story?

57991.「わしの愛する 孫のアイリちゃんが！\n わしの後を継ぎ 物語の続きを\n 描き:
Aili, my beloved grandchild... She took over
and wants to finish off the story...?!

57992.「……そうか！\n それで ふたたび ザンクローネが現れ \n 物語が動きはじめ:
Of course! Zankrone appears once again, and
the story begins to unfold once more!

57993.「うっうっ。あの 病弱だったアイリちゃんが\n 創作の喜びを 見出してくれるとは:
*sob, sob*... It makes this old man happy
that Aili has found the joy of creativity,
even in sickness...

57994.「あい わかった！\n 男 パンパニーニ 享年８７歳！\n アイリちゃんの描く物:
Hey, I got it! Pampanini, male, 87 years old!
Let's carefully observe the story that Aili
chooses to write!

57995.「……おお 忘れとった。 \n 頼みを聞いてくれた 礼をしとらんかったな。\n:
Oops, I forgot. I never thanked you for
lending me a hand. Here, take this.

57996.「アイリちゃんの描く 小さな英雄の物語\n ……続きが 楽しみじゃのう！:
Aili's story of a little hero... I cannot wait
to see how it ends!
